Kashira:
Takeuji (武氏)

Category: Male

– Click image to view.

Plays:

The Amorous Courier (Keisei koibikyaku / 傾城恋飛脚)

The Nunobiki Waterfall (Genpei Nunobiki no taki / 源平布引滝)

The Love-Inspired Murder (Koimusume mukashi hachijō / 恋娘昔八丈)

The Old Tale of Kusunoki (Kusunoki mukashibanashi / 楠昔噺)

The Vendetta in Iga (Iga-goe dōchū sugoroku / 伊賀越道中双六)

The Pine Tree on the River Bank (Kishi no himematsu kutsuwa kagami / 岸姫松轡鑑)

The Woman-Killer and the Hell of Oil (Onnakoroshi abura no jigoku / 女殺油地獄)

The Amorous Courier on the Yamato Highway (Koi no tayori Yamato ōrai / 恋飛脚大和往来)

The Vow of Rokusuke (Hikosan gongen chikai no sukedachi / 彦山権現誓助剣)

The League of the 47 Ronin (Kanadehon Chūshingura / 仮名手本忠臣蔵)

A Tragic Love Triangle (Hadesugata onna maiginu / 艶容女舞衣)

The Two Butterflies (Futatsu chōchō kuruwa nikki / 双蝶々曲輪日記)

The Battles of Genji and Heike (Hiragana seisuiki / ひらかな盛衰記)

The New Usuyuki Story (Shin usuyuki monogatari / 新薄雪物語)

The Love Suicide of Hambei and Ochiyo (Shinjū Yoigōshin / 心中宵庚申)

The Gion Festival (Gion sairei shinkōki / 祇園祭礼信仰記)

The Adachi Plain in Oshu (Ōshu Adachigahara / 奥州安達原)

The Red-Hot Love of the Greengrocer's Daughter (Datemusume koi no higanoko / 伊達娘恋緋鹿子)

The Disinherited Son (Meoto zenzai / 夫婦善哉)
